price: هغه وویل: زر به له الله څخه درته بخښنه وغواړم، بې شكه هماغه ډېر مهربان بخښونكى دى.
arabic: قَالَ سَوۡفَ أَسۡتَغۡفِرُ لَكُمۡ رَبِّيٓۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلۡغَفُورُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: qāla sawfa astaghfiru lakum rabbī innahu huwa al-ghafūru al-raḥīmu
